name: Nin! Nin! Ninja!!!
description: People who like platform games may think this is an easy game, but this is the hardest platforming game EVER! NO ONE CAN COMPLETE THIS GAME.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 , 8 , 8.1 , 10 Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 32-bit CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 399 MB available space
